subject: Simline.eu sim-shop.pl sim-center.pl
description_text:
Hi guys. I see that you are doing a really good job with the current
product line. We would like to be your dealer for Poland and Europe. Can
you send us the terms of trade, where you ship from and the full catalog?

About us:
We run the 2 largest simracing stores in Poland, we have a fully stocked
local store in Poznan, Poland and the largest simracing center in Poland
where customers can test equipment. We are responsible for the success of
many brands in Poland. We are currently official partners of MOZA, Simagic,
Simucube, Heusinkveld, Simtrecs and many others.

What do you think? Do you want to work with us?

Best regard / Pozdrawiam
[image: Photo]

Łukasz Porożyński

CEO

SimLine

Poland, Poznan

Garbary 100/164

lukasz@simline.eu

+48517768318

www.simline.eu

<https://www.tiktok.com/@simline.eu>   <https://www.facebook.com/simline.gt>
  <https://www.youtube.com/@simlineeu>
<https://www.instagram.com/simline.gt/>

conversations.body_text: Hi Lukasz Porozynski,  We’ve reviewed your website and found it to be very professional. May I ask how you currently cooperate with those brands? Is it through bulk purchasing? At the moment, we have only limited stock in Germany for some of our products. We believe there is great potential for cooperation with you and look forward to further discussion.

Hello, yes of course, we always do bulk orders with every manufacturer we
offer. We do not have dropshipping offers. MOZA, Simagic, SimNet we import
directly from China and I think we will do the same with you. I would like
to get a DEMO Pack from you, i.e. every product you offer for testing with
us. Of course not for free, please make the best price you can with fast
shipping to us. We will test your equipment and make a normal order but I
would also like to know the trade conditions :)
About our sales. SimNet we sell about 200 sets per month, Simagic pedals
100-200 sets, and MOZA about 100 (MOZA we sell mainly in bundles)

Your products look very good so they will attract attention in our local
store. Every year we exhibit at the largest gaming fair in Poland, PGA,
putting on a great show. Our stand usually has about 10 simulators, racing
and off-road cars and the entire assortment. We usually have from 200 to
400m2 at our disposal. Of course I can show you a photographic report from
such fairs. Visitors wait in line for 2 hours to try out the equipment, so
it is also a great opportunity for you to promote. In our simracing center
we also have simulators based on one manufacturer so that customers can
test. It is possible that we will want to do the same with your equipment.

czw., 5 cze 2025 o 10:19 service@simsonn.com
